channel.title: Podcast on juri.strumpflohner
channel.description: Recent content in Podcast on juri.strumpflohner

item.title: @angularpodcast - Immutability with Angular with Minko Gechev
item.description: Immutability is something that is a hot topic recently. Although is has been used previously Facebook with React made it popular again (at least that’s my perception).

item.title: JavaScriptJabber - Babel with Sebastian McKenzie
item.description: Cool talk at the JS-Jabber podcast with Sebastian McKenzie, the creator of Babel, the famous JavaScript transpiler. Definitely worth listening. Devs out there, it’s time to get started with ES2015!
